title: Explore Big Bear Airport (L35) - MSFS Addon Review
description:
Welcome to our in-depth review of the Big Bear Airport (L35) addon for Microsoft Flight Simulator! Nestled in the stunning San Bernardino Mountains, Big Bear Airport offers a unique flying experience with its high-altitude location and breathtaking scenery.
